Title: 6 Super Science Edtech Ideas (e272)
Description:
Leah LaCrosse shares six edtech ideas science teachers can start using today to improve learning and excite students about science.

Show Notes: www.coolcatteacher.com/e272

Sponsor:  Legends of Learning has an amazing game based science experiences for students in 3-8 aligning with Next Generation Science and select state standards. Go to coolcatteacher.com/science and sign up for your free account now.
